abstract: Ben Ratliff Critic’s Notebook appraises musical acts at second annual Berserktown, three-day punk festival that features obscure talent and fresh listening options.
lead_paragraph: This three-day festival of various extremes of punk, noise, metal and D.I.Y. culture included over 100 bands or solo artists.

headline.main: Berserktown Festival Offers a Chance to Meet Lesser Known Bands
headline.print_headline: Come Hear the Bands, Some for the First Time

snippet: This three-day festival of various extremes of punk, noise, metal and D.I.Y. culture included over 100 bands or solo artists.
